code: import React,{useEffect,useContext}from'react';import HorizontalBar from'../HorizontalBars/HorizontalBar/HorizontalBar';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{SocketContext}from'../../../SocketContext';import{updateBatteryVoltage,updateMotorTemp,updateMotorControllerAirTemp}from'../../../actions/livePage/monitoringActions.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HorizontalBars(){var socket=useContext(SocketContext);var battery_voltage=useSelector(function(state){return state.monitoring.batteryVoltage;});var motor_temp=useSelector(function(state){return state.monitoring.motorTemp;});var motor_controller_air_temp=useSelector(function(state){return state.monitoring.motorControllerAirTemp;});var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){socket.on('battery_voltage',function(data){dispatch(updateBatteryVoltage(data));});socket.on('motor_temp',function(data){dispatch(updateMotorTemp(data));});socket.on('motor_controller_air_temp',function(data){dispatch(updateMotorControllerAirTemp(data));});},[socket,dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"horizontal-bars-container",style:{marginTop:"48px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HorizontalBar,{sensor:"Battery Voltage",min:battery_voltage.min,value:battery_voltage.value,max:battery_voltage.max,units:"V"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HorizontalBar,{sensor:"Motor Temp",min:motor_temp.min,value:motor_temp.value,max:motor_temp.max,units:"째F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HorizontalBar,{sensor:"Motor Controller Air Temp",min:motor_controller_air_temp.min,value:motor_controller_air_temp.value,max:motor_controller_air_temp.max,units:"째F"})]});}export default HorizontalBars;
